Class ControlPanel

                  mansfield.edu.bmiller.maze.ControlPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class ControlPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

MVC View: displays a panel containing various controls allowing the player to control the look and feel of the game. License: CC BY-SA 3.0 http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/

Author:
John Phillips, Bryan Miller

Serialized Form
